root.pub-comments: Dolgopolsky does not make clear what the internal contrusctions and relations of his examples are. For example, “Old Persian, Middle Persian, and New Persian” are all listed as languages under “Iranian.” Therefore, other sources were consulted in deciding the deeper connections between these languages.
